wikipedia_page.main: Jamie William Lindsay (born 11 October 1995) is a Scottish professional footballer, who plays for Rotherham United. Lindsay has previously played for Celtic, Dumbarton, Greenock Morton and Ross County, and has represented Scotland in youth internationals.

response: *Jamie Lindsay (footballer, born 1995), Scottish footballer (Celtic FC, Dumbarton FC, Ross County FC, currently Rotherham United FC)

link_mentions.page: PFA Scotland Team of the Year

response: Morton sign Celtic starlet Jamie Lindsay on loan for the season.
